SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SENDGRID_USERNAME.description: Your SendGrid address for sending mail.

SENDGRID_PASSWORD.description: Your SendGrid password for sending mail.

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The administrator's email address for signing in.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The administrator's password for signing in.

DOMAIN_NAME.description: Required for sending mail. Give an app name or use a custom domain.
